entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 01:18 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: N 30 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
